lead_paragraph: Floyd Mayweather agreed to move to Showtime after more than 15 years at HBO for a pay-per-view revenue-sharing agreement that is believed to significantly exceed the financial guarantees that HBO offered to retain him.
snippet: Floyd Mayweather agreed to move to Showtime after more than 15 years at HBO for a pay-per-view revenue-sharing agreement that is believed to significantly exceed the financial guarantees that HBO offered to retain him.
